participant_1.background:

my favorite band is the avert brother.
I am a bit stressed from my work, but I'm generally a healthy person.
I check my security cameras to see if any intruders have tried to break in during the night.
I take a moment of silence to appreciate my family and the gift of time.

participant_2.background:
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm curious what they'd have to say about my life as a tiger.
My memories of my family are the most valuable thing I own.
I ride my bicycle to work.
I'm a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors.
i visit comic con.

content.text: Good morning, what are you up to today?
I am getting ready to go to work. How are you doing today?
I am doing well today. I have a busy day ahead of me. I am going to be checking my security cameras at work.
What do you do for work?
I am a security guard. I work at a large building in the city.
I see. I have never been to a fortune teller before. I am curious what they would say about my life as a tiger.
I think you would be a very wise tiger. You seem to have a good head on your shoulders.
Thank you for the compliment. I think my family is the most valuable thing I own. I ride my bicycle to work and I am a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors.
That is interesting. I have never been to Comic Con. What is that like?
It is a lot of fun. There are a lot of people who dress up as different characters from movies and tv shows.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I might have to check it out one day.
You should. It is a lot of fun. I am going to get going now. Have a nice day!
